Actors: Ian Hart, Julia Roberts, Richard Ingram, Liam Neeson
Title: Michael Collins
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 15 nominations.
Plot: Neil Jordan's historical biopic of Irish revolutionary Michael Collins, the man who led a guerrilla war against the UK, helped negotiate the creation of the Irish Free State, and led the National Army during the Irish Civil War.
